CC_creosoteseeds.Name: CC_CreosoteSeeds
CC_creosoteseeds.Description: Grows in the summer or indoors all year. Takes 13 days to fully grow and produces puffs every 5 days after.

CC_Rainpuff.Name: CC_Rainpuff
CC_Rainpuff.Description: A soft white ball that smells like rain and butterscotch.

CC_Remedytea.Name: CC_Remedytea
CC_Remedytea.Description: Sweet-smelling herbal remedy that protects the immune system all day.

CC_Tarotea.Name: CC_Tarotea
CC_Tarotea.Description: A thick and creamy brew that raises stamina all day.

CC_Ferntea.Name: CC_Ferntea
CC_Ferntea.Description: Earthy and bitter, it raises attack power all day.

CC_Gingertea.Name: CC_Gingertea
CC_Gingertea.Description: Sparkling and bright drink that focuses your attention all day.

CC_Cactustea.Name: CC_Cactustea
CC_Cactustea.Description: Fruity, fermented tea that makes you feel lucky.

CC_Tortoiseegg.Name: TortoiseEgg
CC_Tortoiseegg.Description: Desert tortoises are said to grow quite large! Pickle 5 or incubate.

CC_Turtegg.Name: CC_Turtegg
CC_Turtegg.Description: Island turtles lay eggs in clutches - they're fragile! Incubate or pickle a batch.

CC_Tortoiseshell.Name: Tortoiseshell
CC_Tortoiseshell.Description: A highly-prized flake of tortoise shell that sheds off naturally.

CC_Pickledegg.Name: Pickledegg
CC_Pickledegg.Description: Softly boiled and fermented with spiced vinegar. Gets tangier with age!

CC_Hairpin.Name: Hairpin
CC_Hairpin.Description: An elegant, hand-sculpted pin for fancy hairstyles. Ethically sourced!

CC_Turt.BirthText: An island turtle managed to hatch!

Entries.supertime/f Sandy 1000/Time 2100 2400: nightTime/4 6/farmer 4 9 0 Sandy 3 5 1 Wizard 4 5 3/skippable/addConversationTopic supertiming 5/pause 800/speak Sandy "Are you sure it's tonight?$s#$b#The sky is so clear right now!$s"/pause 200/speak Wizard "I am certain.#$b#The pheonicopteridae have begun their dancing ritual."/pause 300/faceDirection Sandy 2/faceDirection Wizard 2/emote Sandy 16/pause 400/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Sandy "@! What are you doing here so late?#$b#The bus to the valley left hours ago...#$b#Unless you were planning to drive yourself back?"/pause 200/speak Wizard "Your timing is unfortunate, @."/emote Sandy 16/faceDirection Sandy 1/pause 400/faceDirection Sandy 2/pause 200/speak Sandy "Oh, you already know each other?#$b#I should have guessed you would make friends with such a mysterious guy!"/pause 400/emote Wizard 40/pause 400/speak Wizard "'Mysterious guy,' hmm...#$b#No matter your purpose, you should get back to the valley as soon as possible.#$b#The desert will not be safe tonight."/pause 400/speak Sandy "Ugh... it's true. I really messed up this time!$s#$b#I should have taken some time off last week.$s#$b#Now I'll have to wait another year...$s"/pause 300/emote Wizard 40/pause 200/speak Wizard "Tell me @, how much do you know about desert ecosystems?"/emote farmer 8/pause 300/playMusic LavaMine/speak Wizard "You have likely noticed that the desert does not follow the same seasons as the valley.#$b#But the region still has it's own elemental cycles.$2#$b#There is the long dry season, but also a wet season once a year.#$b#It occurs when the rain elementals build to a breaking point.#$b#It is a storm of all storms!$2#$b#The monsoon!$2"/pause 600/emote Sandy 40/stopMusic LavaMine/pause 600/speak Sandy "Luckily, this area of the desert stays pretty safe.#$b#It's protected by some 'powerful forces,' whatever that means.#$b#The problem is that there's a special plant that grows in those canyons.#$b#Every summer, they drop these cute puffballs that smell like rain.#$b#It's called a creosote. Have you heard of it?"/pause 200/speak Wizard "Or perhaps you know it by its medicinal term... chaparral.#$b#Or the apothecarian name... greasewood."/pause 400/speak Sandy "When the monsoon hits, it'll wash away all the rainpuffs.#$b#It's terrible... if it wasn't already so late, I'd rush out to get them right now.$s"/pause 200/emote Wizard 40/emote Sandy 40/pause 400/question fork1 "#Offer to help Sandy#Ask the Wizard to warp you home"/fork GoHome/pause 200/speak Sandy "Oh wow, really?$h#$b#That would be amazing, @!#$b#Even just one would help so much!$h"/pause 100/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 200/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 200/speak Wizard "Did you... not listen to my explanation?#$b#The monsoon is highly powerful. Not even my advanced magics can fully stop it.#$b#...#$b#But I can try to keep it at bay for a little while."/pause 200/faceDirection Sandy 1/speak Sandy "Yes!$h"/pause 200/speak Wizard "Be warned... unless you have your own methods of pausing the clock, the night is not young."/pause 200/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 200/playSound shwip/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 0 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 50/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/pause 200/shake Wizard 300/pause 600/speak Wizard "There is now a teleportation scroll waiting for you by the bus stop outside.#$b#One time use only.$2#$b#The canyon twists and turns.$2#$b#Follow the light!$2"/pause 400/playSound shwip/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 0 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 50/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/pause 400/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp/screenFlash 1/pause 400/faceDirection Sandy 2/pause 200/speak Sandy "I'll be waiting up for you, @!"/pause 200/end
Entries.GoHome: pause 300/speak Wizard "Of course."/pause 300/speak Sandy "It was nice to see you, @!#$b#Maybe next year you'll get a chance to try my rainpuff tea!"/pause 200/playSound wand/pause 400/end newDay/

Entries.youmadeit/i CC_Rainpuff: rain/4 6/Sandy 3 5 2 farmer 4 7 0/skippable/addConversationTopic creosoteking 5/pause 200/emote Sandy 16/pause 200/move Sandy 1 0 1/move Sandy 0 1 2/pause 200/speak Sandy "I'm so glad you're okay!#$b#When the rain started, but you weren't back...$s#$b#I was so worried!$s"/pause 200/stopMusic rain/pause 300/playMusic nightTime/faceDirection Sandy 0/pause 600/faceDirection Sandy 2/pause 200/speak Sandy "And just like that, the 'magical barrier' is up again.#$b#So...$s#$b#How did it go out there?"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/itemAboveHead CC_Rainpuff/emote Sandy 16/pause 1400/faceDirection farmer 0/removeItem CC_Rainpuff 1 /emote Sandy 56/pause 400/speak Sandy "You're a lifesaver, @.$h#$b#These rainpuffs can be distilled into the most amazing tea.#$b#The boss in back really likes them.#$b#I'm sure he won't mind if I share the recipe with you!$h"/pause 200/addCookingRecipe CC_Remedytea/message "You learned how to brew Remedy Tea!"/pause 500/speak Sandy "Whew... everything turned out okay.#$b#Oh! And here's one more thing for you, since it's the middle of the night..."/pause 200/addItem 688 1 0/pause 600/speak Sandy "You know... I bet a farmer like you could figure out how to grow creosote bushes.#$b#It would be cool if they were growing on a local farm... wink wink.$h#$b#Okay, @, get home safe!"/pause 200/end

Entries.specialwarp/i CC_Remedytea: summer_day_ambient/4 6/Sandy 2 5 2 farmer 4 9 0 Bouncer 4 8 2/skippable/addConversationTopic warptime 5/playSound doorClose/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speak Bouncer "Hey."/pause 600/speak Bouncer "What's that you got there?"/pause 600/speak Bouncer "Remedy Tea, huh?#$b#...#$b#Since it'll help the boss out, I'm setting something up for you.#$b#It's outside by the bus stop."/pause 300/emote Sandy 40/pause 300/speak Sandy "Uhm...$s#$b#Can I get either of you anything or...?"/pause 200/speak Bouncer "...#$b#Actually..."/pause 400/end

Entries.flamevent/Tile 13 16/Time 600 2500: wavy/13 16/farmer 13 16 0/skippable/playSound Ostrich/pause 600/message "Oh? Riddle?"/question fork1 "Answer what?#324#177#236"/fork fork2/message "No good!"/pause 200/end
Entries.fork2: pause 300/message "Correct one!"/pause 200/message "Clever one!#Maybe you take care of the little guy in there."/pause 200/playSound wand/pause 500/playSound Ostrich/screenFlash 1/pause 400/removeTile 13 15 Buildings/removeTile 13 14 Front/end

Entries.flameagain/Tile 13 16/SawEvent flamevent: wavy/13 16/farmer 13 16 0/skippable/playSound Ostrich/pause 600/message "Ohh? You want in here again?#Sand shift always after the big rain.#Old cave, new cave.#Don't get lost!"/pause 200/playSound wand/pause 500/playSound Ostrich/screenFlash 1/pause 400/removeTile 13 15 Buildings/removeTile 13 14 Front/end

Entries.flamsum/Tile 33 24/Time 600 2500: wavy/30 28/farmer 33 24 1/skippable/playSound Ostrich/pause 600/message "Oh, howdy there!#You must be a big riddle fan to come all this way.#Say, you ever flown to Ginger Island?#Our cousins are always busy over there collecting shiny stones."/pause 200/playSound Ostrich/pause 200/question fork1 "If each Gem Bird found 15 shiny stones, how many would they have total?#15#60#40#85"/fork fork3/message "No good!#Not a big riddle fan after all..."/pause 200/end
Entries.fork3: pause 300/message "Correct one!"/pause 200/message "Listen, the last time I saw my cousin he gave me some little guys.#He says there aren't many of them left in the wild.#You think you could keep them safe?"/pause 200/playSound Ostrich/pause 200/itemAboveHead CC_Turtegg/addItem CC_Turtegg 1/pause 1400/end

Entries.supertiming: Are you going to use the scroll?#$b#Stay safe, okay?#$b#Thank you again!$h
Entries.creosoteking: If you brew some of that tea, will you bring me a cup?
Entries.warptime: That was interesting.#$b#You make friends all over the place, don't you sweetie?

Entries.creosoteking: That was quite a move you pulled in the desert.#$b#I hope it was worth it.

Entries.blueman: Twelve flamingos are standing in a row, and every other flamingo has a leg tucked up. How many legs can you see?
Entries.flamingo1: Do you like riddles?#Some cactus grow their first arm at 75 years old, and each arm after that every 25 years.#How old is a cactus with four arms?
Entries.goldman: If every palm tree grows two coconuts, how many trees would you need to match the number of flamingo legs?#Also, if you want to go home, the warp is to your right.
Entries.goldman2: I wonder what the flamingos eat to stay so pink?#Cactus fruit?#Or are there... desert shrimps?
Entries.blueman2: I bet those old mine tunnels run through this canyon.#I'm always hearing weird sounds at night.
Entries.hiddenman: Don't overthink it. The key is to add them all together.
Entries.touchit: You wanna go back to the top, kid?
